name: blockchain
description: Read the initial pages of the documentation till the first api i.e. /assets api  : https://docs.coincap.io/  ignore most of the stuff ( it might seem very verbose at this stage) and just try to get a basic idea  Now create an API key from the section which says  “Request API Key- Click here to request your API key” the “HEADER” section above it also contains details on how to use this API key “set the header field Authorization=Bearer XXXX” :- you have to create a header named “Authorization” and set its value to “Bearer XXXX” where XXXX stands for the API key that you have generated above
